short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Personalize emails sent from Gmail with the latest on-brand content and track engagement with your buyers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:

• Quick & easy accessibility to all your shareable content

• All of Veelo’s intelligent search, and sorting capabilities, right from within Gmail

• Automatically logs emails in your CRM

Veelo Company Subscription Required.
